title: Mercury (by Radim Pesko)
content:
[http://www.radimpesko.com/fonts/mercury](http://web.archive.org/web/20100126091319/http:/www.radimpesko.com/fonts/mercury "http://www.radimpesko.com/fonts/mercury")

Seen this new foundry floating around on a few of the design blogs recently. I am interested in using this particular font (Mercury) in an upcoming project. I think it is quite nice, and whilst similar to typ1451, it has a much nicer feel to me.

Was just wondering what you guys think?
author: benski

comments.content: {Don't mind me, I'm just tracking this thread so I can see if H&FJ manage to get Pesko to change the name.}

Also tracking... There is also [Mercury Regular and Mercury Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100126091319/http:/www.linotype.com/303422/mercury-family.html) by Stephen Chick, Kristy Chick and the [Mercury](http://web.archive.org/web/20100126091319/http:/www.linotype.com/276807/mercury-family.html) font family by Peter Bruhn.

How old is each of those?

hhp
According to [identifont](http://web.archive.org/web/20100126091319/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=mercury&q=Go), Bruhn's font is from 1998.
According to the wiki entry on [Jonathan Hoefler](http://web.archive.org/web/20100126091319/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonathan_Hoefler), Mercury is dated 1997.

According to the copyright statement in H&FJ Mercury fonts that I have (initial PS retail release), work was begun in 1996. I believe the Esquire debut wasn’t until 1997.

Incidentally, the working title for Ruzicka’s Primer was Mercury (Experimental 290), ca. 1949.
Any thoughts on the typeface itself, discounting the fact that the name has been previously trademarked by H&FJ?

<cite>Any thoughts on the typeface itself, discounting the fact that the name has been previously trademarked by H&FJ?</cite>

To me, it seems rather bland, but maybe it's just that I didn't especially like rounded typefaces\*. Most often they retain too much of a "web 2.0" vibe.  
But, as always, it depends on the specifics and needs of the project at hand.

\* Exception: [http://www.omkrets.se/typografi/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100126091319/http:/www.omkrets.se/typografi/ "http://www.omkrets.se/typografi/")
